title: YOLOv8 Multi-Class Tracking on MOT17
brief: 基于 YOLOv8 与 ByteTrack 的多目标检测与行人追踪项目，在 MOT17 数据集上实现 85% 准确率的端到端追踪流程。
summary: 数据处理：清洗 MOT17 数据并转换 3000+ 标注为 YOLOv8 格式，涵盖 12 类对象
模型训练：基于 Ultralytics YOLOv8n 训练并调参，提升小目标检测效果
多目标追踪：集成 ByteTrack 算法，实现高精度目标 ID 匹配与连续跟踪
结果可视化：输出检测并追踪视频，准确率达 85%，完成端到端行人追踪

title: Protein Interaction Prediction with Flan-T5
brief: 基于 Flan-T5 的多模态大语言模型蛋白质互作预测系统，通过指令微调与特征增强提升生物信息任务性能。
summary: 模型微调：基于 HuggingFace 平台对 Flan-T5 进行指令微调，提升蛋白质互作预测能力
特征增强：将蛋白质 ID 作为特殊 token 输入，融合预训练向量丰富语义表示
流程构建：搭建兼容 HuggingFace 的多模态训练管线，支持数据格式转换与任务配置
性能评估：在多个蛋白质互作数据集上完成预测实验，对比主流大语言模型并量化性能提升

title: MoodCheck AI – Mental Health Companion App
brief: An AI-assisted mood tracking and gentle check‑in app designed for quick daily reflections.
summary: Conversational tips powered by rule‑based prompts (prototype)
Lightweight charts to visualize emotional trends
Focus on micro‑interactions and zero‑friction inputs
problem: People hesitate to log emotions because most trackers feel heavy and time‑consuming.
constraints: Low cognitive load, no long forms
Respect privacy; avoid sensitive clinical wording in UI

notes: Explored how to reduce friction using prefilled suggestions and quick-tap chips

metrics: Prototype usability sessions (n=5): faster task completion vs. baseline notes app
learnings: Short, gentle prompts increase willingness to check-in; charts must stay glanceable

title: Medical Appointment App — Easy Appointment, Better Care
brief: Streamlined doctor search and booking with clear availability and simple pre‑visit prep.
summary: Doctor search with filters and real‑time slots
Accessible contrast and large touch targets
problem: Users struggle to find suitable doctors and understand availability quickly.
constraints: Support for older users (legibility, tap targets)

notes: Tested alternative schedule layouts; grid performed better than list in quick scans

metrics: Prototype task success in navigation flows improved in user tests
learnings: Surfacing availability first reduces back-and-forth between doctor profiles
